attributes.action: charge companies that provide unhealthy food a health tax on their revenue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Obesity is an increasing problem in the UK.  This is creating a significant burden on the national health system. 
We the undersigned believe that the fact that the most unhealthly food is invariably cheap and convenient is a significant contributing factor.  Companies that are profiting from this situation should contribute to the national health burden they are helping to create, which will hopefully also make their products less attractive.
